title: I cannot find the Wi-Fi network when I search for it
answer:
Restart the Wi-Fi hotspot, for example, the wireless router.

Turn the Wi-Fi switch off and then back on again.

Restart your phone.

Check whether the wireless router is set to hide the SSID. If so, the network must be added manually. Select Add network... in the Wi-Fi settings and enter the network SSID following the on-screen prompts. Please refer to the wireless router instructions for a detailed description of the settings.
keywords: wireless signal, Wi-Fi signal, WIFI, wireless network signal, wireless network, search, detect, no wireless signal, no Wi-Fi signal
